title.narrative: IR 2. EPI/MCH INTEGRATED SERVICES

description.narrative: Intermediate Results (IR) 2. EPI/MCH Integrated services (including routine, supplementary immunization) and population schedulable essential interventions, which contributes to Child Health, Immunization. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Component Results (PCR) 1 By 2012 MMR & U5MR reduction and Maternal Mortality Ratio reduced by one third

participating-org.narrative: DIRECTORATE OF PLANNING AND INFORMA MOHS

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
